DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish proportion Bulgarian patient lipid-lowering pharmacological treatment reach LDL-C goal accord Fourth Joint European Task Force guideline .
DOC.brief_title: Study Undertreatment Patients With Dyslipidemia Bulgaria
DOC.criteria: Lipid lower drug treatment least 3 month , dose change minimum 6 week Signed Informed Consent Informed Consent provide
